data.description: Vendetta Online is a cross-platform 3D space combat MMORPG, allowing thousands of players to interact as the pilots of spaceships in a vast universe. Users may build their characters in any direction they desire, becoming rich captains of industry, military heroes, or outlaws. A fast-paced, realtime "twitch" style combat model gives intense action, coupled with the backdrop of RPG gameplay in a massive online galaxy. Three major player factions form a delicate balance of power, with several NPC sub-factions creating situations of economic struggle, political intrigue and conflict. The completely persistent universe and detailed storyline add to the depth of immersion, resulting in a unique online experience.

changelog.change_log:
- Added Quest 2/3/Pro controller meshes.
- Added a text notification on the HUD when a crate is picked up that shows what was picked up and how many units. It can be disabled in  Options -> Advanced -> Interface -> HUD Settings -> Show HUD notification when item is picked up.
- Fixed issue with infinitely repeating crate pickup sound.
- Improved the line width of the 2D selection boxes on the HUD.
- Fixed issue with collision sound effect being played when picking up cargo in space.
- Fixed issue with '?123' button on the in-game touch keyboard not always displaying the numeric keypad.
- Improved crash reporting, to help us react more quickly to future issues.
- Added more logging to track down existing bugs.

- Auto-detection of Quest 3, with improved default graphical settings.
- Workaround for recent, rare issues with Quest devices, where the app loses focus on startup.
- Workaround for Quest lifecycle bugs apparently introduced by a recent Horizon OS update.
- Improved crash reporting for the Quest version, to help us react more quickly to future issues.
Bug fixes, updated assets to latest version.
